metadata.Title: CVE-2018-1000550 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: The Sympa Community Sympa version prior to version 6.2.32 contains a Directory Traversal vulnerability in wwsympa.fcgi template editing function that can result in Possibility to create or modify files on the server filesystem. This attack appear to be exploitable via HTTP GET/POST request. This vulnerability appears to have been fixed in 6.2.32.

criterions.comment: sympa: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
